rules_text:
Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability you don’t control, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy.
Whenever you expend 5, expend 8, or expend 10, copy target spell you control. You may choose new targets for the copy.  [i](You expend 5 as you spend your fifth total mana to cast spells during a turn. A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.)[/i]
